Total of suspicious responses which could result from survey responses. All of our exclusion criteria were pre-registered. The main analysis of our paper allows for at most one suspcious response and our results are similar when we include all participants regardless of whether they satisfy our exclusion criteria.

Dissimilarity (binary) between subject and target where 0 means both share the same sex and 1 means they are opposite sex
Dissimilarity (continuous) between subject and target where 0 means both share the same birthday and 1 means they are very different in age
Dissimilarity (continuous) between subject and target where 0 means limited geographic distance and 1 means maximal geographical distance
Dissimilarity (binary) between subject and target where 0 means both share the same ethnicity and 1 means they have different ethnicities
Dissimilarity (binary) between subject and target where 0 means both share the same ethnicity choice and 1 means they have different ethnicity choices
Dissimilarity (binary) between subject and target where 0 means both share the same race and 1 means they have different races
Dissimilarity (binary) between subject and target where 0 means both share the same religion and 1 means they have different religions
Dissimilarity (binary) between subject and target where 0 means both share the same religious denomination and 1 means they have different religious denominations
Dissimilarity (binary) between subject and target where 0 means both grew up in the same country and 1 means they grew up in different countries
Dissimilarity (binary) between subject and target where 0 means both grew up in the same state and 1 means they grew up in different states
Dissimilarity (binary) between subject and target where 0 means both grew up in the same different country and 1 means they grew up in different different countries

Objective distance (continuous) between subject and target which is a weighted average of the previous variables where 0 means they had identical responses to all questions and 1 means they had maximally different responses
